Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “The City of Oakland is committed to protecting workers by ensuring that all employers in Oakland are complying with laws that protect their rights,”
“We are grateful that the City of Oakland is holding Southwest accountable. We hope that Southwest policies and practices will finally change for good,”
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Southwest employee and an elected ramp representative with the Transport Workers Union of America Local 555

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “Southwest Airlines fully complies with applicable sick leave laws in Oakland and California, as well as with the terms of a December 2020 settlement agreement with the city,”

Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: Southwest is the largest carrier at San Francisco Bay Oakland International Airport and employs roughly 3,000 workers locally.

Named Organization Sources.Name of Source: Transport Workers Union of America Local 555
Oakland’s Department of Workforce Employment Standards
